```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(gridlayout)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

use_gridlayout_rmd(selector_prefix = "#section-")
```

# main {.no-header}

```{gridlayout}
|      |        |         |
|------|--------|---------|
|2rem  |200px   |1fr      |
|150px |header  |header   |
|1fr   |sidebar |main     |
|120px |footer  |footer   |
```
